channel.title: I need version 2
channel.description: can someone make a link to download moparscape verion 2 plz?

item.title: I need version 2
item.dc:creator: @demmond demmond
item.description:
@demmond wrote:

i already have version 3 but it keeps crashing on me. like when im on every 10 min it freezes and brings me to the log in page or freezes for good and i gotta close it . anyway when i try to log on after it says error might be down and some other shit but its not down…
so thats why i need version 2 to play version 2.

Read full topic

item.title: I need version 2
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

they’ve already made version 3.0 and you dont need version 2 to get it. go to the top of any page on moparisthebest.com/smf and click the “home” button the go to the news thing and it should say something like moparscape 3.0 w/ aryan download here click the link and scroll down till there is a link to download it then you should be presented with something that says "download moparscape 3.0 w/ aryan here, here, here, or here. then click one and look for a link that says “your download is ready” click that and the download should start. its sort of a lengthy process but the download itself only takes a few minutes and then the installation takes a few more. so if you do this at an average speed the whole thing should take about 10 minutes.(or more if you have a slower connection than i do )

Read full topic
